job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Backend Engineer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining the platform infrastructure that powers our products. You will work closely with our Frontend Engineers, DevOps Engineers, and other stakeholders to design and build scalable, reliable, and high-performance products.

   Given that most of our team is located in the Netherlands, we only consider candidates for this position who live within commuting distance to our office in Amsterdam.

   What you'll do in this role:
     * Design and implement scalable and reliable backend systems and infrastructure to support our products
     * Develop and maintain our micro-services to expose platform functionality to internal and external clients
     * Collaborate with development and quality assurance teams to ensure high availability, scalability, and security of our systems
     * Collaborate with DevOps Engineers to ensure the continuous delivery and deployment of software products
     * Work with software developers to identify and implement improvements to our platform architecture and functionality
     * Develop and maintain documentation of our systems and processes
     * Mentor and train junior members of the backend team
     * Keep up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies
job_details.full_text:
Backend Engineer

As a Backend Engineer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining the platform infrastructure that powers our products. You will work closely with our Frontend Engineers, DevOps Engineers, and other stakeholders to design and build scalable, reliable, and high-performance products.

   Given that most of our team is located in the Netherlands, we only consider candidates for this position who live within commuting distance to our office in Amsterdam.

   What you'll do in this role:
     * Design and implement scalable and reliable backend systems and infrastructure to support our products
     * Develop and maintain our micro-services to expose platform functionality to internal and external clients
     * Collaborate with development and quality assurance teams to ensure high availability, scalability, and security of our systems
     * Collaborate with DevOps Engineers to ensure the continuous delivery and deployment of software products
     * Work with software developers to identify and implement improvements to our platform architecture and functionality
     * Develop and maintain documentation of our systems and processes
     * Mentor and train junior members of the backend team
     * Keep up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on traditional backend engineering tasks such as designing and implementing scalable backend systems, developing microservices, and collaborating with DevOps. It does not mention any specific generative AI technologies, models, frameworks, or tasks related to LLMs, RAG, or fine-tuning, which are core to the GenAI Engineer profile. While it mentions keeping up with trends, there's no specific focus on AI development. Therefore, it falls under the 'Ambiguous' category as it's a traditional software engineering role and not specifically AI-focused.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'design and implement scalable and reliable backend systems', 'Develop and maintain our micro-services', and 'Work with software developers to identify and implement improvements to our platform architecture and functionality', which are core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement scalable and reliable backend systems and infrastructure to support our products

job_tasks.justification: Developing and maintaining microservices to expose platform functionality is a key aspect of backend software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and maintain our micro-services to expose platform functionality to internal and external clients

job_tasks.justification: Collaborating with development teams to ensure high availability, scalability, and security of systems falls under the umbrella of robust software development practices.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with development and quality assurance teams to ensure high availability, scalability, and security of our systems

job_tasks.justification: Collaborating with DevOps Engineers to ensure continuous delivery and deployment of software products directly relates to the operational aspects of software engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with DevOps Engineers to ensure the continuous delivery and deployment of software products

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'identify and implement improvements to our platform architecture and functionality' indicates a focus on enhancing existing software systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Work with software developers to identify and implement improvements to our platform architecture and functionality

job_tasks.justification: Developing and maintaining documentation for systems and processes is a standard part of software development lifecycle.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and maintain documentation of our systems and processes

job_tasks.justification: Mentoring and training junior members of the team requires strong communication and collaborative skills.
job_tasks.phrase: Mentor and train junior members of the backend team

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Keep up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies' directly reflects the need for continuous learning and adaptability.
job_tasks.phrase: Keep up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies
